mapper.select: SELECT * FROM seat WHERE carriage_id = #{carriageId} ORDER BY row_num ASC, col_num ASC
SELECT * FROM seat WHERE carriage_id = #{carriageId} AND status = 1 ORDER BY row_num ASC, col_num ASC

SELECT s.* FROM seat s INNER JOIN carriage c ON s.carriage_id = c.id WHERE c.train_id = #{trainId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM order_seat os INNER JOIN `order` o ON os.order_id = o.id WHERE os.seat_id = s.id AND o.departure_date = #{departureDate} AND o.order_status IN (0, 1) ) ORDER BY c.carriage_index, s.row_num, s.col_num
